verbs.description: [ARG0: A new bombshell report] [V: revealed] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG1: that First Daughter Ivanka Trump connected her father 's personal attorney Michael Cohen to a Russian bodybuilder who offered to set up a meeting between the U.S. President and Vladimir Putin in order to facilitate the building of a 100-story Trump Tower in Moscow] .
